content: what stitches are more fitting for a coffee cup cozy than the bean stitch and mini bean stitch gauge not particularly important but 3 stitches x 2 row = 1 x 0 75 in half_double_crochet finished size 4 25 in length 3 50 in width time to complete 40 minutes use this pattern in any way you like please just credit me for the design i want this pattern to be as clear and concise as possible so i welcome all suggestions for improvement thank you and happy crafting
